content.question: For a person standing outside of the Great Mosque of Isfahan, the dominant visual element of the mosque is

choices.label: the pathway through a chahar bagh garden that leads to the mosque
a monumental gate that is ornamented with calligraphy from the Qurâ€™an
the pair of cylindrical minarets that indicate the direction of Islamic prayer
an open-air courtyard with a large fountain rising from the middle

content.answer: the pair of cylindrical minarets that indicate the direction of Islamic prayer

unit.text: 7: West and Central Asia, 500 BCE - 1980 CE

topic.text: 7.1: Materials, Processes, and Techniques in West and Central Asian Art

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, technique, and/or content shape a work of art (or group of related works of art).
